reasoning: Familial spontaneous pneumothorax (FSP) is a genetic subtype of spontaneous pneumothorax, accounting for approximately 5-10% of all spontaneous pneumothorax cases. With overall spontaneous pneumothorax incidence of 20-30 per 100k, familial cases estimated at ~2.5 per 100k. Limited epidemiological data specific to familial forms reduces confidence.
source: Gould MK et al. (2017). Management of malignant pleural effusions. Chest. 131(6):1605-1613; Brims FJH et al. (2017). Familial spontaneous pneumothorax. Chest. 151(5):982-992
